alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Palm Beach County through 745 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Okeelanta, or 10 miles south of Belle Glade, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Royal Palm Beach, Okeelanta, Loxahatchee NWR, Belle Glade Camp, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park and The Acreage. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
